metadata.title: Munayki Platform
metadata.description: Connect with ceremonies, therapists, and retreats

tooltips.holistic: Embrace holistic healing, where every facet of your being aligns in a symphony of balance and growth.
tooltips.immersive: Step into an immersive experience that envelops you in transformative energy and gentle renewal.
tooltips.inspiring: Let inspiring moments kindle your inner light, guiding you toward boundless hope and creativity.
tooltips.awaken: Allow your spirit to awaken to the gentle call of each new day, blossoming into profound self-discovery.
tooltips.wisdom: Discover wisdom that whispers ancient truths, anchoring you with clarity and serene purpose.
tooltips.mind: Nurture your mind as a sanctuary of calm and creativity, where thoughtful insights bloom.
tooltips.body: Honor your body as a temple of natural vitality, gracefully carrying you through life's journey.
tooltips.soul: Embrace your soul, a profound wellspring of love and purpose, revealing the beauty of your inner self.

holistic.title: Holistic Investment Projects
holistic.description: Discover transformative projects that blend spiritual growth with sustainable development, creating positive impact for communities and the environment.

project1.title: Sacred Valley Eco-Lodge
project1.description: A sustainable retreat center in Peru's Sacred Valley, combining traditional healing practices with eco-friendly accommodation and permaculture gardens.

project2.title: Indigenous Wisdom Center
project2.description: Supporting indigenous communities in preserving and sharing their ancestral knowledge while creating sustainable economic opportunities.

project3.title: Healing Arts Academy
project3.description: An educational hub for holistic healing practices, combining ancient wisdom with modern wellness approaches and research.

footer.tagline: Your journey to holistic wellbeing begins here

newsletter.title: Newsletter
